title: Monday Post Show (02-14-22)
itunes:title: Monday Post Show (02-14-22)
description:
Bobby starts by playing some voicemails that he didn’t get to during the morning show. Bobby gets a text from the Arkansas Women’s Basketball coach with tips on how to be better at pickup games. Raymundo shares a way to get into any event or concert for $20 bucks. A caller has another business proposal for Lunchbox on how to make money. We also give our final thoughts on the Super Bowl.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
